text: Lekin phir bhi tum ney aapas mein qatal kiya aur aapas kay aik firqay ko jila watan bhi kiya aur gunah aur ziyadti kay kaamon mein inn kay khilaf doosray ki taraf daari ki haan woh jab qaidi ho ker tumharay pass aaye to tum ney unn kay fidye diye lekin inn ka nikalna jo tum per haram tha (uss ka kuch khayal na kiya) kiya baaz ehkaam per eman rakhtay ho aur baaz kay sath kufur kertay ho? Tum mein say jo bhi aisa keray uss ki saza iss kay siwa kiya ho kay duniya mein ruswaee aur qayamat kay din sakht azab ki maar aur Allah Taalaa tumharay aemaal say bey khabar nahi
